DataElement.preferredName: Patient Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of cancer therapeutic procedure to determine clinical trial eligibility for a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: Patients initially recognized to have high-risk disease treated with topotecan/cyclophosphamide initiated on an emergent basis and within allowed timing, and with consent as described in Section 3.1.5

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Patients initially recognized to have high-risk disease treated with topotecan/cyclophosphamide initiated on an emergent basis and within allowed timing, and with consent as described in Section 3.1.5
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Patients initially recognized to have high-risk disease treated with topotecan/cyclophosphamide initiated on an emergent basis and within allowed timing, and with consent as described in Section 3.1.5

PermissibleValues.value: Patients observed or treated with a single cycle of chemotherapy per a low or intermediate risk neuroblastoma regimen for what initially appeared to be non-high-risk disease but subsequently found to meet the criteria in Section 3.2.3
